exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u f : nat -> X Unable to unify "∑ 0 f ⊕ f 0" with "f 0 ⊕ ∑ 0 (fun n : nat => f (S n))".
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment X : Type m : X -> X -> X u : X Hmonoid : monoid_theory m u n : nat f : nat -> X IHn : ∑ (S n) f = ∑ n f ⊕ f n Unable to unify "∑ n f ⊕ f n ⊕ f (S n)" with "f 0 ⊕ ∑ (S n) (fun n : nat => f (S n))".

original: induction n. - rewrite msum_S. reflexivity. - rewrite msum_S. rewrite IHn. reflexivity.
